desc: Alison Tetrick is a professional cyclist and has partnered with Oso Creatives to design bandanas for style and the bike to help bring more inclusion into the sport of cycling. Proceeds of the bandana will be used for scholarships for women and diversity cycling. Bandanas with a purpose! Giddy up!

layout.text: Giddy Up. Wear a bandana. Ride bikes. Make bikes better for all.
